member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.AppControl
member.summary: Represents the control message to exchange between applications.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the instance of the AppControl class.
member.exception: Thrown when failed to create the AppControl handle.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes the instance of the AppControl class with a parameter.
member.param: The flag value to receive an additional launch result event on the launch request.
member.exception: Thrown when failed to create the AppControl handle.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.#ctor(Tizen.Applications.SafeAppControlHandle)
member.summary: Initializes the instance of the AppControl class with the SafeAppControlHandle.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.SafeAppControlHandle
member.summary: Gets the SafeAppControlHandle instance.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.Operation
member.summary: Gets and sets the operation to be performed.
member.value: The operation is the mandatory information for the launch request. If the operation is not specified, AppControlOperations.Default is used for the launch request. If the operation is AppControlOperations.Default, the package information is mandatory to explicitly launch the application. (if the operation is null for setter, it clears the previous value.)

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.Mime
member.summary: Gets and sets the explicit MIME type of the data.
member.value: (if the mime is null for setter, it clears the previous value.)

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.Uri
member.summary: Gets and sets the URI of the data.
member.value: Since Tizen 2.4, if the parameter 'uri' is started with 'file://' and it is a regular file in this application's data path, which can be obtained by property DataPath in ApplicationInfo class, it will be shared to the callee application. Framework will grant a temporary permission to the callee application for this file and revoke it when the callee application is terminated. The callee application can just read it. (if the uri is null for setter, it clears the previous value.)

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.Category
member.summary: Gets and sets the explicit category.
member.value: (if the category is null for setter, it clears the previous value.)

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.ApplicationId
member.summary: Gets and sets the application ID to explicitly launch.
member.value: (if the application ID is null for setter, it clears the previous value.)

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.LaunchMode
member.summary: Gets and sets the launch mode of the application.
member.value: Although, LaunchMode were set as AppControlLaunchMode.Group, the callee application would be launched as a single mode if the manifest file of callee application defined the launch mode as "single". This property can just set the preference of the caller application to launch an application. Sub-applications, which were launched as a group mode always have own process. Since Tizen 3.0, if launch mode is not set in the caller application control, this property returns the AppControlLaunchMode.Single launch mode.

example.code: AppControl appControl = new AppControl(); appControl.LaunchMode = AppControlLaunchMode.Group;

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.ExtraData
member.summary: Gets the collection of the extra data.
member.value: Extra data for communication between AppControls.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.GetMatchedApplicationIds(Tizen.Applications.AppControl)
member.summary: Retrieves all applications that can be launched to handle the given app_control request.
member.returns: ApplicationIds.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of an invalid parameter.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.SendLaunchRequest(Tizen.Applications.AppControl)
member.summary: Sends the launch request.
member.remarks:
The operation is mandatory information for the launch request. If the operation is not specified, AppControlOperations.Default is used by default. If the operation is AppControlOperations.Default, the application ID is mandatory to explicitly launch the application.
Since Tizen 2.4, the launch request of the service application over out of packages is restricted by the platform. Also, implicit launch requests are NOT delivered to service applications since 2.4. To launch a service application, an explicit launch request with the application ID given by property ApplicationId MUST be sent.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of a null argument.
Thrown when failed because of an invalid operation.
Thrown when failed because of timeout.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.SendLaunchRequest(Tizen.Applications.AppControl,Tizen.Applications.AppControlReplyCallback)
member.summary: Sends the launch request.
member.remarks:
The operation is mandatory information for the launch request. If the operation is not specified, AppControlOperations.Default is used by default. If the operation is AppControlOperations.Default, the application ID is mandatory to explicitly launch the application.
Since Tizen 2.4, the launch request of the service application over out of packages is restricted by the platform. Also, implicit launch requests are NOT delivered to service applications since 2.4. To launch a service application, an explicit launch request with the application ID given by property ApplicationId MUST be sent.
member.param: The callback function to be called when the reply is delivered.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of the argument is invalid.
Thrown when the application to run is not found.
Thrown when the request failed to launch the application.
Thrown when the launch request is rejected.
Thrown when the memory is insufficient.
Thrown when the permission is denied.
Thrown when failed because of timeout.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.SendTerminateRequest(Tizen.Applications.AppControl)
member.summary: Sends the terminate request to the application that is launched by AppControl.
member.remarks: You are not allowed to terminate other general applications using this API. This API can be used to terminate sub-applications, which were launched as a group mode by the caller application. Once the callee application is being terminated by this API, other applications, which were launched by the callee application as a group mode will be terminated as well.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of the argument is invalid.
Thrown when failed because of an invalid operation.
Thrown when failed because of timeout.

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.ExtraDataCollection
member.summary: Class for extra data.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.ExtraDataCollection.Add(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds extra data.
member.remarks: The function replaces any existing value for the given key.
member.param: The name of the extra data.
The value associated with the given key.
member.exception: Thrown when a key or a value is a zero-length string.
Thrown when the application tries to use the same key with the system-defined key.

example.code: AppControl appControl = new AppControl(); appControl.ExtraData.Add("myKey", "myValue");

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.ExtraDataCollection.Add(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Adds extra data.
member.remarks: The function replaces any existing value for the given key.
member.param: The name of the extra data.
The value associated with the given key.
member.exception: Thrown when key or value is a zero-length string.
Thrown when the application tries to use the same key with the system-defined key.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.ExtraDataCollection.Get``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the extra data.
member.returns: The value associated with the given key.
member.exception: Thrown when the key is an invalid parameter.
Thrown when the key is not found.
Thrown when the key is rejected.

example.code: AppControl appControl = new AppControl(); string myValue = appControl.ExtraData.Get<string>("myKey");

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.ExtraDataCollection.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the extra data.
member.returns: The value associated with the given key.
member.exception: Thrown when the key is an invalid parameter.
Thrown when the key is not found.
Thrown when the key is rejected.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.ExtraDataCollection.GetKeys
member.summary: Gets all keys in extra data.
member.returns: The keys in the AppControl.
member.exception: Thrown when the key is an invalid parameter.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.ExtraDataCollection.TryGet(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Tries getting the extra data.
member.param: The value associated with the given key.
member.returns: The result whether getting the value is done.
member.exception: Thrown when the key is an invalid parameter.
Thrown when the key is not found.
Thrown when the key is rejected.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.ExtraDataCollection.TryGet(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String}@)
member.summary: Tries getting the extra data.
member.param: The value associated with the given key.
member.returns: The result whether getting the value is done.
member.exception: Thrown when the key is an invalid parameter.
Thrown when the key is not found.
Thrown when the key is rejected.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.ExtraDataCollection.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the extra data.
member.param: The name of the extra data.
member.exception: Thrown when the key is a zero-length string.
Thrown when the key is not found.
Thrown when the key is rejected.

example.code: AppControl appControl = new AppControl(); appControl.ExtraData.Remove("myKey");

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.ExtraDataCollection.Count
member.summary: Counts keys in the extra data.
member.returns: The number of counting keys.
member.exception: Thrown when the key is an invalid parameter.

example.code: AppControl appControl = new AppControl(); int numberOfKeys = appControl.ExtraData.Count();

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.AppControl.ExtraDataCollection.IsCollection(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the extra data associated with the given key is of the collection data type.
member.param: The name of the extra data.
member.returns: If true, the extra data is of the array data type, otherwise false.
member.exception: Thrown when the key is a zero-length string.
Thrown when failed to check the key.

example.code: AppControl appControl = new AppControl(); bool result = appControl.ExtraData.IsCollection("myKey");

member.summary: Checks whether the application information is nodisplay. If the application icon is not displayed on the menu screen, true; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ApplicationInfo.IsOnBoot
member.summary: Checks whether the application is launched on booting time. If the application automatically starts on boot, true; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ApplicationInfo.IsPreload
member.summary: Checks whether the application is preloaded. If the application is preloaded, true; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.ApplicationInfoFilter

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.ApplicationInfoFilter.Values
member.summary: This class is a possible value to use in the InstalledApplicationFilter.

member.name: F:Tizen.Applications.ApplicationInfoFilter.Values.InstalledInternal
member.summary: A pre-defined value string for InstalledStorage key. This value means that the application is installed at internal storage.

member.name: F:Tizen.Applications.ApplicationInfoFilter.Values.InstalledExternal
member.summary: A pre-defined value string for InstalledStorage key. This value means that the application is installed at external storage.

member.name: F:Tizen.Applications.ApplicationInfoFilter.Values.InstalledExtended
member.summary: A pre-defined value string for InstalledStorage key. This value means that the application is installed at extended storage.

member.summary: This class is a possible key to use in the InstalledApplicationFilter.

member.summary: Occurs whenever the installed applications get launched.

member.summary: Occurs whenever the installed applications get terminated.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ApplicationManager.GetInstalledApplicationsAsync

member.summary: Returns if the specified application is running or not.
member.returns: Returns true if the given application is running, otherwise false.
member.exception: Thrown when the given parameter is invalid.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ApplicationManager.GetRecentApplications
member.summary: Gets the information of the recent applications.
member.returns: Returns a dictionary containing all the recent application info.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of an invalid operation.

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.Bundle
member.summary: A bundle object represents a bundle. A bundle holds items (key-value pairs) and can be used with other Tizen APIs. Keys can be used to access values. This class is accessed by using a constructor to create a new instance of this object. A bundle instance is not guaranteed to be thread safe if the instance is modified by multiple threads.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.#ctor
member.summary: The bundle constructor.
member.exception: Thrown when out of memory.

example.code: Tizen.Applications.Bundle bundle = new Tizen.Applications.Bundle();

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.#ctor(Tizen.Applications.SafeBundleHandle)
member.summary: The bundle constructor.
member.exception: Thrown when the handle is null or invalid.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.Count
member.summary: The number of items in a bundle object.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.Keys
member.summary: The keys in a bundle object.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.SafeBundleHandle
member.summary: Gets the SafeBundleHandle instance.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.Dispose
member.summary: Releases any unmanaged resources used by this object.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.Contains(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the bundle contains an item with a specified key.
member.returns: true if the bundle contains the key, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.AddItem(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Adds an item into the bundle.
member.param: The key to identify the item with. If an item with the key already exists in the bundle, this method will not succeed.
member.exception: Thrown when the key already exists or when there is an invalid parameter.
Thrown when a value is null.
Thrown when out of memory or when the bundle instance has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.AddItem(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds an item into the bundle.
member.param: The key to identify the item with. If an item with the key already exists in the bundle, this method will not succeed.
The zero-based byte offset in value from which to add to the bundle.
The maximum number of bytes to add to the bundle starting with offset.
member.exception: Thrown when the offset or count is out of range.
Thrown when the key already exists or when there is an invalid parameter.
Thrown when a value is null.
Thrown when out of memory or when the bundle instance has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.AddItem(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an item into the bundle.
member.param: The key to identify the item with. If an item with the key already exists in the bundle, this method will not succeed.
member.exception: Thrown when the key already exists or when there is an invalid parameter.
Thrown when out of memory or when the bundle instance has been disposed.

example.code: Tizen.Applications.Bundle bundle = new Tizen.Applications.Bundle(); bundle.AddItem("string", "a_string");

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.AddItem(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Adds an item into the bundle.
member.param: The key to identify the item with. If an item with the key already exists in the bundle, this method will not succeed.
member.exception: Thrown when the key already exists or when there is an invalid parameter.
Thrown when out of memory or when the bundle instance has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.GetItem(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of a bundle item with a specified key.
member.param: The key of the bundle item whose value is desired.
member.returns: The value of the bundle item.
member.exception: Thrown when the key does not exist or when there is an invalid parameter.
Thrown when the bundle instance has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.GetItem``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of a bundle item with a specified key. Note that this is a generic method.
member.param: The key of the bundle item whose value is desired.
member.returns: The value of the bundle item if it is of the specified generic type.
member.exception: Thrown when the key does not exist or when there is an invalid parameter.
Thrown when the value of the bundle item cannot be converted to the specified generic type.
Thrown when the bundle instance has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.TryGetItem(System.String,System.Byte[]@)
member.summary: Gets the value of a bundle item with a specified key.
member.param: The key of the bundle item whose value is desired.
The value of the bundle item. If the key does not exist or the type of this parameter is incorrect, it is the default value for the value parameter type.
member.returns: true if an item with the key exists and if the value is the same type as the output value parameter, false otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown when the bundle instance has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.TryGetItem(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the value of a bundle item with a specified key.
member.param: The key of the bundle item whose value is desired.
The value of the bundle item. If the key does not exist or the type of this parameter is incorrect, it is the default value for the value parameter type.
member.returns: true if an item with the key exists and if the value is the same type as the output value parameter, false otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown when the bundle instance has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.TryGetItem(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String}@)
member.summary: Gets the value of a bundle item with a specified key.
member.param: The key of the bundle item whose value is desired.
The value of the bundle item. If the key does not exist or the type of this parameter is incorrect, it is the default value for the value parameter type.
member.returns: true if an item with the key exists and if the value is the same type as the output value parameter, false otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown when the bundle instance has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.Is``1(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether an item is of a specific type.
member.typeparam: The generic type to check for.
member.param: The key whose type wants to be checked.
member.returns: true if the item is of the specified type, false otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown when the key does not exist or when there is an invalid parameter.
Thrown when the bundle instance has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.RemoveItem(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a bundle item with a specific key from a Bundle.
member.param: The key of the item to delete.
member.returns: true if the item is successfully found and removed, false otherwise (even if the item is not found).
member.exception: Thrown when there is an invalid parameter.
Thrown when the bundle instance has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.Decode(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes an encoded bundle data.
member.param: The encoded bundle data. bundleRaw should be the returned value of Tizen.Applications.Bundle.Encode, otherwise this method will not succeed.
member.returns: Decoded Bundle object.
member.exception: Thrown when there is an invalid parameter.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.Encode
member.summary: Encodes bundle to string.
member.returns: Encoded bundle data in string.
member.exception: Thrown when out of memory or when the bundle instance has been disposed.

example.code: Tizen.Applications.Bundle bundle = new Tizen.Applications.Bundle(); string bundleRaw = bundle.Encode();

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases any unmanaged resources used by this object. Can also dispose any other disposable objects.
member.param: If true, disposes any disposable objects. If false, does not dispose disposable objects.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Bundle.Finalize
member.summary: Destructor of the bundle class.

member.summary: Occurs when the application is launched.

member.summary: Occurs when the application is about to shutdown.

member.summary: Occurs whenever the application receives the appcontrol message.

member.summary: Occurs when the system memory is low.

member.name: E:Tizen.Applications.CoreApplication.LowBattery
member.summary: Occurs when the system battery is low.

member.summary: Occurs when the system language is chagned.

member.summary: Occurs when the region format is changed.

member.summary: Occurs when the device orientation is changed.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.CoreApplication.Backend
member.summary: The backend instance.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreApplication.Run(System.String[])
member.summary: Runs the application's main loop.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreApplication.Exit
member.summary: Exits the main loop of the application.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreApplication.OnCreate
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the application is launched. If base.OnCreated() is not called, the event 'Created' will not be emitted.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreApplication.OnTerminate
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the application is terminated. If base.OnTerminate() is not called, the event 'Terminated' will not be emitted.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreApplication.OnAppControlReceived(Tizen.Applications.AppControlReceivedEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the application receives the appcontrol message. If base.OnAppControlReceived() is not called, the event 'AppControlReceived' will not be emitted.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreApplication.OnLowMemory(Tizen.Applications.LowMemoryEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the system memory is low. If base.OnLowMemory() is not called, the event 'LowMemory' will not be emitted.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreApplication.OnLowBattery(Tizen.Applications.LowBatteryEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the system battery is low. If base.OnLowBattery() is not called, the event 'LowBattery' will not be emitted.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreApplication.OnLocaleChanged(Tizen.Applications.LocaleChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the system language is changed. If base.OnLocaleChanged() is not called, the event 'LocaleChanged' will not be emitted.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreApplication.OnRegionFormatChanged(Tizen.Applications.RegionFormatChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the region format is changed. If base.OnRegionFormatChanged() is not called, the event 'RegionFormatChanged' will not be emitted.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreApplication.OnDeviceOrientationChanged(Tizen.Applications.DeviceOrientationEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the device orientation is changed. If base.OnRegionFormatChanged() is not called, the event 'RegionFormatChanged' will not be emitted.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.CoreApplication.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases any unmanaged resources used by this object. Can also dispose any other disposable objects.
member.param: If true, disposes any disposable objects. If false, does not dispose disposable objects.

member.summary: Represents directory information of the application.

member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the application's data directory, which is used to store private data of the application.

member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the application's cache directory, which is used to store temporary data of the application.

member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the application resource directory. The resource files are delivered with the application package.

member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the application's shared data directory, which is used to share data with other applications.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.DirectoryInfo.SharedResource
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the application's shared resource directory, which is used to share resources with other applications.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.DirectoryInfo.SharedTrusted
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the application's shared trusted directory, which is used to share data with a family of trusted applications.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.DirectoryInfo.ExternalData
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the application's external data directory, which is used to store data of the application.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.DirectoryInfo.ExternalCache
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the application's external cache directory, which is used to store temporary data of the application.

member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the application's external shared data directory, which is used to share data with other applications.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.DirectoryInfo.ExpansionPackageResource
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the application's TEP(Tizen Expansion Package) directory. The resource files are delivered with the expansion package.

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.SafeAppControlHandle
member.summary: Represents a wrapper class for an unmanaged AppControl handle.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.SafeAppControlHandle.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SafeAppControlHandle class.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.SafeAppControlHandle.#ctor(System.IntPtr,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SafeAppControlHandle class.
member.param: An IntPtr object that represents the pre-existing handle to use.
true to reliably release the handle during the finalization phase; false to prevent reliable release.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.SafeAppControlHandle.IsInvalid
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the handle is invalid.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.SafeAppControlHandle.ReleaseHandle
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, executes the code required to free the handle.
member.returns: true if the handle is released successfully.

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.TizenSynchronizationContext
member.summary: Provides a synchronization context for the Tizen application model.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.TizenSynchronizationContext.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TizenSynchronizationContext class.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.TizenSynchronizationContext.Initialize
member.summary: Initilizes a new TizenSynchronizationContext and install into the current thread.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.TizenSynchronizationContext.Post(System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Dispatches an asynchronous message to a Tizen main loop.
member.param: The object passed to the delegate.
member.remarks: The post method starts an asynchronous request to post a message.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.TizenSynchronizationContext.Send(System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Dispatches a synchronous message to a Tizen main loop.
member.param: The object passed to the delegate.
member.remarks: The send method starts a synchronous request to send a message.
